frame.name: Notability
frame.definition:
<def-root>An entity is considered worthy of mention for their ability or influence among some <fen>Type</fen> of similar entities. The entity need not be well-known or famous, though if it is, it may be stated by its <fen>Name</fen> only. Their worth may be restricted to a <fen>Time</fen> or <fen>Place</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Name">Dali</fex> is one of the <t>great</t> <fex name="Type">artists</fex> <fex name="Time">of the 20th century</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition:
<def-root>The kind of thing which is notable. This may be an event, place, item, or role and is plural.
<ex>Shakespeare is one of the <t>great</t> <fex name="Type">poets</fex>.</ex>
<ex>The Four Seasons is a <t>notable</t> <fex name="Type">hotel</fex>.</ex>
<ex>"Green Eggs and Ham" is one of the <t>great</t> <fex name="Type">children's books</fex>.</ex>
<ex>The US civil war is perhaps the most <t>notable</t> <fex name="Type">of the US's wars</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition:
<def-root>The name of the notable entity.
<ex><fex name="Name">Shakespeare</fex> is one of the <t>great</t> poets.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time during which the entity is considered notable.
<ex>Bob Dylan is among the most <t>notable</t> musicians <fex name="Time">of the 20th century</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The geographic area in which the entity is considered notable.
<ex>Dumas is one of the most <t>notable</t> authors <fex name="Place">in France</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the individual of a certain Type from the norm of that Type.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: great.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: particularly adept, influentual, or important
